snippet.textDisplay:
I will never forget this level. Very short and easy, but so surrealistic. Not to mention the epic music. I played this game to death in kindergarten.

One of the most memorable levels in gaming history.
snippet.textOriginal:
I will never forget this level. Very short and easy, but so surrealistic. Not to mention the epic music. I played this game to death in kindergarten.

snippet.textDisplay: @minusjason Some people pick up a game, but don't get seriously into gaming from their first game, but later on they become hardcore gamer thanks to some other game they play. So I merely wished to emphasize this got me started on gaming as in my first game AND what got me seriously into video games.
snippet.textOriginal: @minusjason Some people pick up a game, but don't get seriously into gaming from their first game, but later on they become hardcore gamer thanks to some other game they play. So I merely wished to emphasize this got me started on gaming as in my first game AND what got me seriously into video games.

snippet.textDisplay:
"Two down, six more to go- beat you in a flash b*tch, there 'ya-.
FLASH!
Ahh...
You fool, Flash Man in the House and I'm breakin' the rules!
No fair I'm frozen in the air!
Time's on my side, no time to spare.
'Bout to shoot these Metal Blade's straight in your face.
Put all of Wily's robots in their place!
Leave you there so long you rust!
When I'm done here all that'll be left is dust.
My time to shine 'cause I'm better than most."

<3 Duane and Brand0's rendition on this.
snippet.textOriginal:
"Two down, six more to go- beat you in a flash b*tch, there 'ya-.
FLASH!
Ahh...
You fool, Flash Man in the House and I'm breakin' the rules!
No fair I'm frozen in the air!
Time's on my side, no time to spare.
'Bout to shoot these Metal Blade's straight in your face.
Put all of Wily's robots in their place!
Leave you there so long you rust!
When I'm done here all that'll be left is dust.
My time to shine 'cause I'm better than most."

<3 Duane and Brand0's rendition on this.

snippet.textDisplay:
i seriously love this game. it's my favorite game in the series and one of my favorites of all time. 

i think it's soundtrack isn't nearly the best in the series though. all the themes are good and one is even in my all time favorites but most of them never really stayed in my mind.
snippet.textOriginal:
i seriously love this game. it's my favorite game in the series and one of my favorites of all time. 

i think it's soundtrack isn't nearly the best in the series though. all the themes are good and one is even in my all time favorites but most of them never really stayed in my mind.

snippet.textDisplay:
Started gaming? 3 years old.
First game? Megaman 2.
First level? Flashman.
I thought he was Anti-Megaman(who thanks to th cover art I thought was a super cop).
Almost 20 years later, and I still look back to this and think "This is what got me started on gaming - period."
snippet.textOriginal:
Started gaming? 3 years old.
First game? Megaman 2.
First level? Flashman.
I thought he was Anti-Megaman(who thanks to th cover art I thought was a super cop).
Almost 20 years later, and I still look back to this and think "This is what got me started on gaming - period."
